mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.id,c.nickName,b.createTime,b.typeId FROM mydb.ImageRes a inner join mydb.Res b inner join mydb.Account c ON a.id=b.id and b.createAccountId=c.id Where c.email=#{email} union SELECT a.*,c.id,c.nickName,b.createTime,b.typeId FROM mydb.TextRes a inner join mydb.Res b inner join mydb.Account c ON a.id=b.id and b.createAccountId=c.id Where c.email=#{email};
